item.title: After meeting the European leaders, US President Trump called Russian President Putin to discuss a meeting between the Russian and Ukrainian leaders. #DonaldTrump #VladimirPutin #VolodymyrZelensky #Ukraine #Russia #US #BBCNews

item.title: US President Trump's comments, which appeared to refer to Putin, were picked up by a hot mic as he gathered European leaders and Ukrainian President Zelensky in talks aimed at ending the war in Ukraine. #DonaldTrump #VladimirPutin #VolodymyrZelensky #Ukra

item.title: Marius Borg Høiby, 28, has been charged with 32 offences, including four counts of rape, a prosecutor said. He denies the most serious accusations against him, but plans to plead guilty to some lesser charges when the trial starts. #MariusBorgHøiby #Princ

item.title: Momade Jussab, 66, has been charged with one count of sexual assault by penetration and two counts of sexual assault, and was found guilty after a trial at Lewes Crown Court in March. He is now serving a six-and-a-half year prison sentence. #QatarAirways
